javadoc: A {@link JRadioButton} that disables HTML rendering.

methods.javadoc: Creates a blank radio button with HTML rendering disabled.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a blank radio button with HTML rendering disabled.

methods.javadoc:
Creates a radio button with the specified icon, with HTML rendering disabled.
@param icon image to display
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a radio button with the specified icon, with HTML rendering disabled.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a radio button with properties taken from the specified Action, with HTML rendering
 disabled.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a radio button with the specified icon and selected state, with HTML rendering 
 disabled.

params.name: selected
params.comment: initial selection state, true means selected

methods.javadoc:
Creates a radio button with the specified text, with HTML rendering disabled.
@param text string to be displayed by the label
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a radio button with the specified text, with HTML rendering disabled.

params.name: text
params.comment: string to be displayed by the label

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a radio button with the specified text and selected state, with HTML rendering
 disabled.

params.name: text
params.comment: string to be displayed by the label

params.name: selected
params.comment: initial selection state, true means selected

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a radio button that has the specified text and icon, with HTML rendering disabled.

params.name: text
params.comment: string to be displayed by the label

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a radio button that has the specified text, icon, and selected state, with
 HTML rendering disabled.

params.name: text
params.comment: string to be displayed by the label

params.name: selected
params.comment: initial selection state, true means selected

name: GRadioButton
comment: A JRadioButton that disables HTML rendering.
